headers.value: default-src 'self' https://telegram.org https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://api.telegram.org https://cs2-mini-app-api.onrender.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://telegram.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com;
